degree.title: High School Diploma with Physical Sciences
degree.description: I studied at IES S'Arenal where I took the scientific baccalaureate. During my time there, I developed solid skills in JavaScript, Java, MySQL, CSS and HTML. I acquired these competencies through internships, exams and assignments that challenged my understanding and skills in programming and web design. These experiences enriched my education and prepared me to face the challenges of the technological world with confidence and skill.

degree.title: Associate Degree of Multiplatform Applications Development
degree.description: I studied at CIFP Pau Casesnoves the Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development, where I acquired skills in Flutter, Linux, Git and GitHub, Dart, MongoDB and Java. I developed these skills through internships, exams and projects, where I obtained a final average of 9.7. Thanks to this training, I feel able to face challenges in the world of software development with solidity and confidence.

degree.title: Full Stack Mobile App Development Bootcamp
degree.description: KeepCoding's Full Stack Mobile Bootcamp provides a complete mastery of the main components and architectures of the mobile stack, training at an advanced level in native Swift, native Kotlin, React Native and Flutter.

course.title: Introduction to Web Development I
course.description: In this course held at Google, I learned the basics of web development, learning skills such as basic HTML and basic CSS.

course.title: Mobile Apps Development
course.description: In this course held at Google, I learned the basics of mobile app development, learning skills such as Android and iOS operating systems, application deployment on Google Play and mobile marketing and monetization avenues.

course.title: AWS Cloud Particioner Essentials
course.description: In this course on Amazon Web Service, I learned the basics of how to set up a server, the different types of services offered by AWS and the ways to upload applications to AWS.

course.title: Introduction to Web Development II
course.description: In this course held at Google, I continued learning the basics of web development, learning skills such as advanced HTML, advanced CSS and Bootstrap.

course.title: Google Cloud Computing
course.description: In this course held at Google, I learned the basics of how to set up a server, the different types of services offered by Google and the ways to upload and deploy applications in Google Cloud.

course.title: Kotlin
course.description: In this course held at KeepCoding, I learned both the basics and advanced techniques of Kotlin programming.

course.title: Docker for developers
course.description: In this course held at OpenWebinars, I learned the principles of Docker as well as how to create Dockerfiles or docker-compose.

course.title: UI/UX Design
course.description: Thanks to the follow up of KeepCoding's Mobile App Development Bootcamp I have managed to obtain the UI/UX design certificate, where I have learned current UI/UX techniques, as now can be standards of IOS and Android design, future techniques such as Neomorphism.

course.title: Swift
course.description: Thanks to the follow-up of KeepCoding's Mobile App Development Bootcamp, I managed to obtain the Swift programming certificate, where I learned both the basic notions and advanced techniques of Swift programming.

course.title: IOS Fundamentals
course.description: Thanks to the follow-up of the Mobile App Development Bootcamp at KeepCoding, I have obtained the IOS Fundamentals certificate, where I have acquired basic knowledge of Storyboard and XIBs development programming in Swift UIKit.
